description: Retrieves a list of servers that are one network hop away from a specified server.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Configuration ID of the server for which neighbors are being listed.

parameters.name: neighborConfigurationIds
parameters.description: List of configuration IDs to test for one-hop-away. (string) ---

nested_items.name: neighbors
nested_items.description: List of distinct servers that are one hop away from the given server.

nested_items.name: sourceServerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the server that opened the network connection.

nested_items.name: destinationServerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the server that accepted the network connection.

nested_items.name: destinationPort
nested_items.description: The destination network port for the connection.

nested_items.name: transportProtocol
nested_items.description: The network protocol used for the connection.

nested_items.name: connectionsCount
nested_items.description: The number of open network connections with the neighboring server.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Token to retrieve the next set of results. For example, if you specified 100 IDs for ListServerNeighborsRequest$neighborConfigurationIds but set ListServerNeighborsRequest$maxResults to 10, you received a set of 10 results along with this token. Use this token in the next query to retrieve the next set of 10.

nested_items.name: knownDependencyCount
nested_items.description: Count of distinct servers that are one hop away from the given server.
